text: Zisas wo phorga rui gumgir kov, mbe ndav vo, Zerikon hegi. Mbe Zerikon hegap, Zisas wo phorga rui gumgi gum mba Zisas phorga ndai gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrve, mbe Zeriko thav vuim, rɨmani mbatɨgi guma Bartimeus, ana maaŋ ki. Bartimeus ana Timeusan kam ma. Ana mba tuap gaar perav kav, ŋkɨɨ ga nzuav, nzambara mbatɨgar gumgi ga mbui.
